overview: Alex knows all about Markie's straight life, but he doesn't care. As long as Markie gives him that good straight boy dick. Mikey finds out that Eric is worried about a girl he's seeing. It turns out that Eric is a virgin and he's afraid of how he'll perform. Mikey laughs and tells Eric they'll get to the bottom of this together. Johnny is visibly distraught. Seems he caught a glimpse of best friend Roman fucking someone else and it triggered a sudden jealousy. To Roman, it was just a fuck, he tells Johnny that he had no idea he was interested in more than a friendship. As Johnny Hill makes his way over to Jordan Boss' new place, he happens upon Jordan butt naked jacking off in front of a mirror. Oops.. what should he do?
title: He's Got a Raw Secret
